function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of RT-qPCR inhibition in wastewater samples","Impact":"Misdiagnosis of infectious diseases, potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Use of proper quality control measures, validation of results through alternative methods","Technologies":"RT-qPCR quality control assays, sequencing platforms, gel electrophoresis","People":"Laboratory technicians, public health officials, general public","Owner":"Laboratory technicians, public health officials"},{"Description":"Potential RT-qPCR contamination during RNA extraction and setup","Impact":"False positive or false negative results, incorrect interpretation of infectious disease presence","Mitigation":"Separate performance of RNA extraction and RT-qPCR setup, inclusion of reagent and extraction blank for each batch","Technologies":"RNA extraction kits, separate laboratory facilities for RNA extraction and RT-qPCR setup","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Laboratory technicians, research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Sequencing and bioinformatics processes for TaqMan RT-qPCR products","Impact":"Misinterpretation of sequencing results, incorrect identification of pathogens in the wastewater samples","Mitigation":"Validation of sequencing results through multiple platforms, use of quality control measures in sequencing and bioinformatics analysis","Technologies":"Sanger sequencing, Illumina sequencing, gel electrophoresis, bioinformatics tools","People":"Bioinformaticians, laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, bioinformatics experts, laboratory technicians"}]}
